answers.answer: Pray God covers you and your baby with his blood... how far along are you
I pray healing for both you & baby and that God will protect you both in Jesus name, Amen!!
Thanks mommies I'm 34+5. First baby came at 31 weeks because of preeclampsia. Thankful that I got further this time.
Praying for you. Mine got up to 193/120 and they gave me a shot in the ER.  I've been on meds e'er since am now labeled high risk. I pray you and your baby will be OK.

question: Woke up with a blood pressure of 189/111 yesterday and been in hospital every since. I just want me and baby to be out of danger so we can go home. Prayers please.
title: Blood Pressure!
